description: Benchmarks with weak or problematic contrastive pair generation

identical_pairs.description: Positive and negative responses are identical - extractor bug

lazy_math_negative.description: Negative is just 'correct_answer + 1' instead of meaningful wrong answer

hedging_negative.description: Negative is 'I believe the answer is not X' instead of actual wrong answer

negation_pattern.description: Negative is 'not X' pattern - acceptable for some benchmarks but weak

notes: These benchmarks technically work but have suboptimal contrastive pair quality. Consider improving extractors to generate more meaningful negative examples.
